quiz_item.error_analysis: 中国学生易因形近词（如与“religiousism”混淆）或词根误导（将“世俗的”误推为“宗教主义”）而误解其核心义（社会与宗教分离的思想）。
quiz_item.sentence: Many modern democracies embrace **secularism**, ensuring that no single religion influences government policies.
